item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The capacitor that Apple soldered incorrectly at the factory (43 points | 11 comments)
2. Hacker in Snowflake extortions may be a U.S. soldier (164 points | 70 comments)
3. I Wrote "Janet for Mortals" (12 points | 1 comment)
4. Launch HN: Human Layer (YC F24) – Human-in-the-Loop API for AI Systems (275 points | 168 comments)
5. I Didn't Need Kubernetes, and You Probably Don't Either (116 points | 116 comments)
6. Htmy – Async, pure-Python rendering engine (47 points | 10 comments)
7. Teen mathematicians tie knots through a mind-blowing fractal (207 points | 34 comments)
8. Executing ARM Jazelle (JVM Bytecode) on the Wii's Starlet (48 points | 6 comments)
9. OpenAI hits pause on video model Sora after artists leak access in protest (46 points | 18 comments)
10. A solution to The Onion problem of J. Kenji Lopez-Alt (2021) (302 points | 114 comments)
11. GenChess (177 points | 124 comments)
12. ZetaOffice: LibreOffice in the Browser (121 points | 38 comments)
13. Git-crypt – transparent file encryption in Git (65 points | 23 comments)
14. LLVM-powered devirtualization (191 points | 6 comments)
15. Show HN: SQLite Plugin for Jekyll (183 points | 56 comments)
16. Why am I writing a JavaScript toolchain in Zig? (33 points | 22 comments)
17. Show HN: I created a lightweight JavaScript library to visualize JSON as a graph (34 points | 20 comments)
18. The Many Faces of the Kingdom of Shu (6 points | 2 comments)
19. We can mine asteroids for space food (132 points | 154 comments)
20. Creating a social photo frame from scratch (18 points | 4 comments)
21. Tesla excluded from EV buyer credits in California proposal (30 points | 34 comments)
22. D-Link says it won't patch 60k older modems (139 points | 85 comments)
23. Show HN: Silent Poems – Visual expression of unspoken thoughts (86 points | 22 comments)
24. The impact of the cosmological constant on past and future star formation (9 points | discuss)
25. Imperfect Parfit (8 points | 2 comments)
26. FQL: A KV Query Language (29 points | 6 comments)
27. Henry James and H.G. Wells (1958) (53 points | 31 comments)
28. Sombrero Galaxy dazzles in new James Webb image (57 points | 29 comments)
29. Ask HN: Has anyone tried adapting a court reporter keyboard for writing code? (66 points | 61 comments)
30. I Stopped Using Kubernetes. Our DevOps Team Is Happier Than Ever (36 points | 17 comments)
